pages.text: "A machine capable of oxidizing solid materials into gas phase"$(p)The Chemical Oxidizer converts an item into its gas/chemical counterpart...and that's it.$(p)$(bold)Supported Upgrades:$()$(li)$(l:item/upgrades/upgrade_speed)Speed Upgrades$(/l) (8) $(li)$(l:item/upgrades/upgrade_energy)Energy Upgrades$(/l) (8) $(li)$(l:item/upgrades/upgrade_muffling)Muffling Upgrades$(/l) (4)
